subject: Baseball
Radio
lead_paragraph: Forty-one years after Johnny Vander Meer’s no-hitter at Ebbets Field on June 15, 1938, the sports broadcaster Red Barber recapitulated the game that never made the airwaves.
snippet: Forty-one years after Johnny Vander Meer’s no-hitter at Ebbets Field on June 15, 1938, the sports broadcaster Red Barber recapitulated the game that never made the airwaves.
